00088     template<
00089         std::size_t N, typename L, typename Tag1, typename Tag2, 
00090         BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(
00091                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, 
00092             typename T
00093         )
00094     >
00095     class container 
00096         : public fusion_aux::link_holder<L, N == 0>,
00097         public functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00098                 fusion_matrix_aux::container<N, L, Tag1, Tag2,
00099                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(
00100                         BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, 
00101                     T
00102                 )       
00103             >,
00104             boost::mpl::unpack_args<
00105                         fusion_matrix_aux::meta_result<N, L, Tag1, Tag2,
00106                         BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(
00107                                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, 
00108                         T
00109                         )       
00110                 >
00111             >
00112         >
00113     {
00114 
00115         typedef boost::mpl::int_<0> int0_;
00116         typedef boost::mpl::int_<1> int1_;
00117         typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> size_;
00118         typedef typename boost::mpl::minus<size_,int1_>::type index_;
00119         typedef Tag1 assign_tag_;
00120 
00121                 template<typename T>
00122         struct wrapper{ typedef ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,T> type; };
00123         
00124         typedef fusion_aux::link_holder<L, N == 0> link_;
00125 
00126                 typedef fusion_matrix_aux::meta_result<N, L, Tag1, Tag2,
00127             BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(
00128                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, 
00129                 T
00130             )   
00131         > meta_result_;
00132 
00133                 typedef functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00134                 container,
00135             boost::mpl::unpack_args<
00136                         meta_result_
00137             >
00138         > super_t;
00139 
00140                 typedef boost::mpl::vector<
00141                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00142         > vec_;
00143 
00144         public:
00145 
00146                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00147         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(size_type, static_row_size = N);
00148         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(size_type, 
00149                 static_column_size = boost::mpl::size<vec_>::value
00150         );
00151 
00152                 container(){}
00153 
00154 #define MACRO1(z, n, data)\
00155     BOOST_PP_CAT(w, n) ( BOOST_PP_CAT(_, n) )\
00156 
00157 #define MACRO2(z, n, data) \
00158     explicit container( \
00159         const L& l BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) \
00160         BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(n, T, & _) \
00161     ) : link_( l )\
00162           BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING(n, MACRO1, ~)\
00163     {}\
00164         
00165 BOOST_PP_REPEAT(
00166         BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY,
00167     MACRO2,
00168     ~
00169 )
00170 #undef MACRO1
00171 #undef MACRO2
00172 
00173         // ------ operator() ----- //
00174                 //       adds a row                //
00175         // ----------------------- //
00176 
00177         template<
00178                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_WITH_A_DEFAULT(
00179                 BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00180                 typename U,
00181                 boost::mpl::na
00182                 )
00183         >
00184         struct result : boost::mpl::apply<
00185                 meta_result_,
00186             BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(
00187                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY,
00188                 U
00189                 )
00190         >{};
00191 
00192                 using super_t::operator();
00193 
00194         typename result<>::type
00195         operator()()const{
00196                 typedef typename result<>::type result_;
00197                 return result_( *this );
00198         }
00199 
00200 #define MACRO1( z, n, data ) \
00201  ( BOOST_PP_CAT(_,n) ) \
00202 
00203 
00204 #define MACRO2(z, N1, data) \
00205     template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N1, typename U)> \
00206     typename result<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N1, U)>::type \
00207     impl( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N1, U, &_) )const{ \
00208         typedef typename result<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N1, U)>::type result_; \
00209         return result_( *this BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(N1, _) );\
00210     } \
00211 
00212 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00213         1,
00214     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00215     MACRO2,
00216     ~
00217 )
00218 #undef MACRO1
00219 #undef MACRO2
00220 
00221                 // Row extraction
00222 
00223         template<int I>
00224         struct is_head : boost::mpl::bool_< I + 1 == N >{};
00225 
00226         template<int I>
00227         struct link_result_static_row 
00228                 : L::template result_static_row<I>{};
00229 
00230                 template<int I>
00231                 struct result_static_row : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00232                 is_head<I>,
00233             boost::mpl::identity<
00234                 container const&
00235             >,
00236             link_result_static_row<I>
00237         >{};
00238 
00239         template<int I>
00240         typename boost::lazy_enable_if<
00241                 is_head<I>,
00242                 result_static_row<I>
00243         >::type
00244         static_row(boost::mpl::int_<I> index)const
00245         {
00246                 return (*this);
00247         }
00248                 
00249         template<int I>
00250         typename boost::lazy_disable_if<
00251                 is_head<I>,
00252                 result_static_row<I>
00253         >::type
00254         static_row( boost::mpl::int_<I> index )const
00255         {
00256                 return static_cast<link_ const&>( 
00257                 *this 
00258             ).link().static_row( index );       
00259         }
00260 
00261                 // Column extraction
00262 
00263 #define MACRO(z, n, data)\
00264     private: \
00265         typename wrapper<BOOST_PP_CAT(T,n)>::type BOOST_PP_CAT(w,n); \
00266     public: \
00267     BOOST_PP_CAT(T,n)& static_column(boost::mpl::int_<n>)const\
00268     {\
00269         return this->BOOST_PP_CAT(w,n).unwrap(); \
00270     }\
00271 
00272 BOOST_PP_REPEAT(
00273         BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY,
00274     MACRO,
00275     ~
00276 )
00277 #undef MACRO
00278 
00279     };
